option.name: PARAMETERS
option.value: --nnodes=1 --nproc_per_node=1 run_distillation.py --headless --distributed --task=Dextrah-Kuka-Allegro --num_envs 64 env.distillation=True --enable_cameras env.simulate_stereo=False --teacher dextrah_lab/rl_games/logs/rl_games/dextrah_lstm/2026-01-08_16-27-56/nn/dextrah_lstm.pth --data_aug env.img_aug_type="rgb" env.aux_coeff=10. env.objects_dir="visdex_objects" env.max_pose_angle=45 env.adr_custom_cfg_dict.fabric_damping.gain="[10.0, 20.0]" env.adr_custom_cfg_dict.reward_weights.finger_curl_reg="[-0.01, -0.01]" env.adr_custom_cfg_dict.reward_weights.lift_weight="[5.0, 0.0]" env.use_cuda_graph=True
